rules_text:
When Moonscythe enters, search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {4} [i]({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
